channel.title: Pages on transcending ___
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on transcending ___

item.title: Grub
item.description: Memorized boot option Modify /etc/default/grub like below GRUB_DEFAULT=saved Re-generate /boot/grub/grub.

item.title: Kubeadm
item.description: Prerequisites Disable SELinux Disable firewalld Disable swap Add lines below to /etc/sysctl.

item.title: Kubernetes
item.description: System configuration sudo systemctl stop firewalld sudo systemctl disable firewalld sudo systemctl stop iptables sudo systemctl disable iptables sudo sysctl -w net.

item.title: Letsencrypt
item.description: Installation yum install -y certbot Request cert certbot certonly --server https://acme-v02.

item.title: Lvm
item.description: List physical, volume group, and logical volumes pvs vgs lvs Resize logical volume # RHEL 6 lvextend -L 4G /dev/mapper/rootvg-lv.

item.title: Misc
item.description: Add VIP ifconfig eth0:1 192.168.50.53 netmask 255.255.255.0 CD burning growisofs -dvd-compat -Z /dev/dvd=DVD_Image.

item.title: Mysql
item.description: Passwords mysqladmin -u root password NEW_PASSWORD # when root has no password mysqladmin -u root -p OLD_PASSWORD password NEW_PASSWORD # when root has password mysqladmin -u user -p OLD_PASSWORD password NEW_PASSWORD Permissions mysql> grant all on database_name.

item.title: Nginx
item.description: Proxy upstream apihub_gunicorn { least_conn; server localhost:6500 max_fails=3 fail_timeout=60 weight=1; } server { listen 443 ssl; server_name sre-pr-util01.

item.title: Openssl
item.description: Create a CA certificate/key pair # Generate a CA key protected with a password openssl genrsa -des3 -out ca.

item.title: Phpbrew
item.description: Reference https://github.com/phpbrew/phpbrew Installation Prerequisites sudo apt-get install build-essential php7.0 php7.0-dev php-pear autoconf automake curl sudo apt-get install libcurl4-openssl-dev libxslt1-dev re2c libxml2-dev libxml2 php7.

item.title: Samba
item.description: Installation sudo yum install samba sudo apt-get install samba Configuration sudo vim /etc/samba/smb.

item.title: Ssh
item.description: SSH over SOCKS5 proxy # Install tsocks sudo apt install tsocks # Ubuntu sudo pacman -S tsocks # Arch # Put content below into /etc/tsocks.

item.title: Tcpdump
item.description: General usage tcpdump -nvvi eth0 dst 10.200.227.145 and dst port 80 Capture header tcpdump -vvvs 1024 -l -A -i lo port 5601 | grep es-security-runas

item.title: Tools
item.description: ag - find in file https://github.com/ggreer/the_silver_searcher bat - cat replace with colors https://github.

item.title: Vagrant
item.description: Create base box Install OS using the following conditions Use vagrant as username and password Install Virtual Box Guest Addition Add public key below to ~/.

item.title: Vault
item.description: Interactions export VAULT_ADDR=http://127.0.0.1:8200 vault init -key-shares=1 -key-threshold=1 # Initialize vault. Save keys and root token vault unseal [unseal key] # Do this N number of times as -key-shares when initializing vault vault login [token] # Login into vault to perform actions Endpoints vault secrets enable -path=[endpoint] [storage_backend] # Create secret endpoint vault secrets enable -description="chimera simple ping sites" -path=sites kv # Created key/value endpoint at /sites vault secrets enable -description="chimera passwords storage" -path=passwords kv # Created key/value endpoint at /passwords vault secrets enable -description="sqlmon connections storage" -path=sqlmon kv # Created key/value endpoint at /sqlmon vault secrets list [-detailed] # List all available enpoints Policies vault policy list # List policies vault policy read [policy_name] # Read content of a policy vault policy read [chimera] vault policy write [policy_name] [policy_file] # Create a policy vault policy write synthetic policy.

item.title: Vim
item.description: Plugged Plugin Manager Install Plugged plugin manager via https://github.com/junegunn/vim-plug Add the following lines into your ~/.

item.title: Virtualbox
item.description: Resize disk VBoxManage clonemedium disk inputDisk.vmdk outputDisk.vdi --format VDI VBoxManage modifymedium disk outputDisk.

item.title: Wsl
item.description: Installation dism.exe /online /enable-feature /featurename:Microsoft-Windows-Subsystem-Linux /all /norestart dism.exe /online /enable-feature /featurename:VirtualMachinePlatform /all /norestart # OR Enable-WindowsOptionalFeature -Online -FeatureName Microsoft-Windows-Subsystem-Linux Enable-WindowsOptionalFeature -Online -FeatureName VirtualMachinePlatform Disable-WindowsOptionalFeature -Online -FeatureName Microsoft-Windows-Subsystem-Linux Disable-WindowsOptionalFeature -Online -FeatureName VirtualMachinePlatform Create rootfs from Docker image sudo su - mkdir rootfs && docker export $(docker create archlinux) | tar -C rootfs -xf - cd rootfs && tar czf .

item.title: Apache
item.description: Enable SSL SSLCertificateFile /path/to/crt/file SSLCertificateKeyFile /path/to/key/file Enable MIME-Type zipping LoadModule deflate_module modules/mod_deflate.

item.title: Docker
item.description: Running containers docker run -t -i IMAGE COMMAND docker run -t -i ubuntu /bin/bash docker run -d ubuntu /bin/bash docker stop CONTAINER docker start CONTAINER # start previously stopped container docker exec -it CONTAINER COMMAND # attach to running container docker exec -it mycontainer bash # attach to running mycontainer and use bash shell docker rm CONTAINER # remove stopped container docker rm `docker ps -aq` # remove all stopped containers docker rm $(docker ps -aq) # remove all stopped containers - -t tty terminal inside container - -i grab STDIN of container - -d run as daemon - -P automatically map container's ports to host Monitoring containers docker ps - -l return last running container - -a list all containers docker logs CONTAINER # see CONTAINER's outputs docker logs -f nostalgic_morse # follow nostalgic_morse's output docker top CONTAINER # list processes running inside container - -f follow, like tail -f docker inspect nostalgic_morse # list JSON data about nostalgic_morse docker inspect -f '{{range .

item.title: Firewalld
item.description: Reference https://firewalld.org/documentation/man-pages/firewall-cmd.html Zones firewall-cmd --get-zones # list zones firewall-cmd --list-all --zone=external # show a zone settings firewall-cmd --list-all-zones # show all zones settings firewall-cmd --permanent --zone=trusted --add-interface=ens192 # add interface to zone firewall-cmd --permanent --zone=external --remove-interface=ens224 # remove interface from zone Services firewall-cmd --permanent --zone=internal --add-service=dhcp firewall-cmd --permanent --zone=internal --remove-service=dns Ports firewall-cmd --permanent --zone=internal --add-port=2379/tcp firewall-cmd --permanent --zone=internal --remove-port=2380/tcp Forwarding firewall-cmd --permanent --zone=external --add-forward-port=port=10122:proto=tcp:toaddr=10.

item.title: Fpm
item.description: Create RPM fpm -s dir -t rpm -n browsermob-proxy -v 2.
